website_summaries.verdict: The Leitz Icon Smart Labeling System's text quality is a little below par for a label printer, but convenience features—like the ability to print on both paper and plastic—outweigh any issues with output quality.
cons: Although text is easily readable, it's not always well formed, particularly when printing on plastic label stock

customer_reviews.title: High Class & Techie Label Printer for your office
customer_reviews.text: You can even print labels from your Iphone, How great is that ? It works really good and easy to setup. The only downside is that the labels is a little bit more expensive than your generic labels. But if you print labels on a small scale, this item is totally worth it. If you are printing labels on a large scale, you might want to get something with cheaper label options.
customer_reviews.author: Omer A.

customer_reviews.title: The labels are so awesome I can't get over it
customer_reviews.text: I have just printed some practice labels with this machine. I did not try the wireless hook-up. The labels are so awesome I can't get over it. I am a crafter and wanted an easier way to label my products. I was tired of crooked printing on label sheets. It is not in color but choices of grey scale. Has lots of font selection and you can import clip art. I love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: A. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Poor printing - doesn’t scan at post office.
customer_reviews.text: This printer never printed clearly and the multitude of instructions to correct it from the manufacturer didn’t work. I asked Leitz to recycle it since I was tired of fiddling around with it - and they don’t recycle their products! They wouldn’t take it back. Terrible product, terrible company.
customer_reviews.author: STASHERS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Label Printer, Excellent Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Nice label printer. Initial setup could be easier. Great customer support. Don't hesitate to use it if you have problems. Don't try to remove the cardboard material on the label cartridges. It's part of the cartridge. Did it on the cartridge that came with the printer. Support replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: I love this little printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little printer. It's easy to set up and use, but for what I needed, it is not suitable. The printing fades over time. Now I know the difference between a laser printer and an inkjet printer.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this personal printer
customer_reviews.text: Love this personal printer, I can do just about anything i want to print, the best gadget ever, came on time,
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: visually appealing labeler but lacking in capability
customer_reviews.text: This labeler has potential. I don't understand why the manufacturer does not allow a high-resolution graphic to be printed. A high-resolution image of, say a shipping label, would make more sense printed on a smaller width label at 3.5" for this labeler (versus 4.0" for Dymo brand labeler). The software really needs to be revamped. Even if you screen grab or import a high-resolution image into the software, the output is still low-resolution. Label appears grainy. iPhone barcode scanner apps will have trouble reading the code. The printed text are challenging to read - not that they are tiny, letters have blurry edges.
customer_reviews.author: BCH

customer_reviews.title: A good printer; however
customer_reviews.text: A good printer;however, had issues getting it set up as it would stop in the middle while programming information. IT dept. little slow in helping us trouble shooting. Overall, has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Green

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: Love how diverse its software is (it's mac compatible!), I mainly use it to create shipping labels but also label things around my business and the house. It's a mighty little machine that is very very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: mr.H

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: complex not worth it. different size then standard mailing formats
customer_reviews.author: Manpreet Goraya

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with US labels
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to get it to work. The labels available for this product does not match the pre-configured labels in the software, I guess is the US/European size differences. Loading cartridges are easy, but the device has issues recognizing the loaded labels. Cartridges are very expensive and flaky. Made out of card boards. Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Roshanak Gilani

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the printer, also I bought three "label cassettes," these two were damaged and never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: No worth buying
customer_reviews.text: A new product developed specifically to address the issues label printers have - and then the printer really disappoints. I greatly regret buying this printer and would gladly go back to using Dymo label printer. I have spent way too much time trying (still unsuccessfully) to setup the printer on WiFi. No help from the company and a terrible interface. DO NOT BUY this printer. Wait for Leitz to update/upgrade the model and software.
customer_reviews.author: KPUSA

customer_reviews.title: Find a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Jams up and always in error state. Find a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It prints in black only and i thought it printed in color so was a little disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The original roll that came with the unit was damaged. I ordered an extra roll, which worked.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: -- Super easy to change rolls and comes with an optional battery --
customer_reviews.text: Leitz Icon Smart Labeling System's text quality is a little below par for a label printer, but convenience features—like the ability to print on both paper and plastic—outweigh any issues with output quality, however on ease of use and price it should be directly compared to this labeling system here:  PROS: + Fast. + Rolls are easy to change. + Automatic cutter. + Both paper and plastic labels. + Die-cut labels and continuous rolls. + Optional battery. CONS: - Although text is easily readable, it's not always well formed, particularly when printing on plastic label stock.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: What crap, it is not integrated with Ebay
customer_reviews.text: This is what happens when you don't read customer reviews first (shame on me). I needed a label printer for my Ebay and Etsy mailing labels so I got this little monster from the local office store. What crap, it is not integrated with Ebay, Etsy, Paypal or Google Print. Statements on the label regarding postage mailing are completely misleading. I have to go through a ton of hoops & use photoshop to even use it (then it wastes about 2 in of label per print). Worse, you have to download 98 mb software to even use it. Is it easily found? Heck no. Seriously, these people need to get it together. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You must have much patience for this......
customer_reviews.text: If you love pulling out your hair over an electronic item, then this is for you. If you like over 400 attempts to insert a cartridge and still FAIL, then this is the item for you! I will say, when this thing is working good, it is great. But when the paper runs out and you need to change it, and are under deadline, fuhgeddaboutit! Even when not in a hurry, it takes so many tries for the label cartridge to be loaded correctly. Please do not be taken in by it's fast printing and low cost propoganda....
customer_reviews.author: Taady

customer_reviews.title: Nice features, big size
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how large this label printer is. We have used a handheld label printer for years, but I was looking for something with more options. This has several nice options, and was really easy to use. Its main disadvantage is its size. It is really too big to be portable. I realize that may not be a big deal to some people, but it made it impractical. I have gone back to the smaller handheld unit as a standard, but will keep this around for special cases.
customer_reviews.author: kdea473

customer_reviews.title: Cute for gifts and crafts
customer_reviews.text: I am a stay at home Mom and I am using this mostly for crafts and gifts. It is very simple to set up and operate. My son gets a big kick out of it and if makes gifts look very polished for giving. I love having a cute label to stick on homemade treats that I give. I wish it came with software that had cute templates.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: A DISASTER. DO NOT BUY THIS. THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO CUSTOMER SUPPORT, IT IS VERY LIMITED AND DOES NOT WORK AS DESCRIBED. THEY DON'T EVEN LIST THE UNITED STATES AS A LOCATION WHEN YOU TRY TO REGISTER. ALL I WANTED WAS A WIRELESS LABEL MAKER BUT COMPARED TO MY AGED DYMO TWIN TURBO THIS IS IN THE DARK AGES. IT LOOKS SO GOOD, BUT IT'S BAD, BAD, BAD.
customer_reviews.author: DSNYC

customer_reviews.title: LEITZ ICON SOFTWARE FAR TOO SLOW!
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with the printer BUT the software is terribly slow and awkward. It really needs to be improved by Leitz. Why they can put out a good label printer and not software is a misterey to me. I even upgraded the Ram in my laptop to speed things up. That is how slow the program runs and prints. Increasing the RAM helped only marginally. DYMO LABEL software is far better and much, much faster. I am going to increase my hard disk and see if that improves the Leitz software performance. I doubt that it will.
customer_reviews.author: CLARENCE  WALKER

customer_reviews.title: LOVE  new Icon Printer
customer_reviews.text: Love my printer. I bought it for work and use it everyday to print labels. Just got the battery pack and now I can take it home. Very nice feature is not having lots of different size labels, just a roll that can cut many sizes with the software.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The app won't work with my iPhone or with my Amazon fire. the app sucks and only a few colors print proper.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE BROTHER QL 710 instead
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish DO NOT BUY !! The printer itself is not that bad BUT THE LEITZ APP TO CONTROL IT FROM AN I PHONE OR I PAD IS USELESS !!! You can't copy and paste text into the app from an e mail Ie an address from a paypal payment The brother app is far far better and their QL 710 is far better than this icon rubbish
customer_reviews.author: Mr Turbo

product_meta.title: Leitz Icon Wireless Label Printer, 7013000
product_meta.description: Leitz Icon Wireless Smart Label Printer
feature_bullets: Print from anywhere and share on your network
Print labels wirelessly using the free, Leitz Icon App (Windows, Mac, and iOS Compatible)
Print labels from .5 inches to 3 feet long
Use the automatic cutter for precise cuts/create custom sized labels
New in May 2016: Major software update across all platforms (Windows, Mac, iOs and Android) provides an easier installation, improved print quality and better overall performance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars47 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
